# Dex-Trade Crypto Exchange

## Buy and Sell Crypto The Easy Way

Dex-Trade is a cryptocurrency trading platform designed for people by people.
It is a reliable and secure way to trade crypto with low fees and unmatched
liquidity. Get an exceptional experience with Dex-Trade’s demo trading
account, apply for free coins, and play the games to earn more crypto. And
above all, we give you access to the widest variety of cryptocurrencies on the
market.

Get Started

  * ###  $111 Million 

24h trading volume on Dex-Trade Exchange

  * ###  330+ 

Cryptocurrencies that are listed on Dex-Trade

  * ###  300K+ 

Registered users who already trust Dex-Trade

  * ###  221K+ 

Active and vibrant community

  *   *   *   * 

## Quick Exchange

  * Fast

They say time is money, so no need to wait for your order to be completed and
have your funds in lock position

  * Convenient

The easy intuitive interface allows you to process your exchange in a matter
of a few clicks.

  * Vast choice

The quick exchange function is available for each and every coin and token
that is listed on Dex-Trade exchange

## Best-in-class trading terminal

Spot Trading

Participate in top coin markets through Dex-Trade’s hyper dynamic crypto
trading terminal with a user friendly UI

Demo Trading

We have created one of the best demo terminals for educating our users and
taking their first steps in the world of cryptocurrencies and trading

Margin Trading

Soon

In the near future, we will provide you with the most convenient tool and
terminal for Margin Trading

Start Trading

##  Get started in minutes

Step 1

Register

Create you trade account on Dex-Trade in a few simple clicks

Step 2

Deposit

Securely connect your account to deposit funds

Step 3

Trade

Buy, sell and swap digital assets 24/7

Make a Deposit

## Snap the coins during an IEO, before they reach everyone else

Initial Coin Offering

Learn about pros and cons of the new altcoins before they get picked up on the
trading floor

Low pricing

All IEO tokens are offered at a discount rate that beats the market

High bonuses

Get additional bonuses from projects by becoming an early adopter

IEO Dashboard

##  The crypto trading platform that is always with you

Get access to the limitless crypto market in a pocket format, be it mobile or
tablet. No bugs, no latency delays and no freezes. You can now trade
cryptocurrencies safely and on the go.

  * Real time crypto price reporting and trading
  * BTC, ETH, XRP, SOL, DOGE - buy and sell digital assets with the lowest fees and blazing fast onboarding 
  * Keep your finger on the pulse of the market with instant price volatility notifications, listing of new crypto assets, important events from the world of top coin markets 
  * Get updates on new IEOs, airdrops, free coins, tournaments and competitions
  * Perform cross exchange price comparisons all in one place, with access to over 300 top coins

Download on the

App Store

GET IT ON

Google Play

##  Why Dex-Trade?

Dex-Trade loves security

Dex-Trade is a centralised cryptocurrency exchange founded in 2017 in Belize

Data privacy

We value each and every member of our community and keep this data safe

Support

We strive to be there for you 24/7, helping you along every step of your
crypto trading journey

Features

Unmatched liquidity, early access to most wanted altcoins, crypto demo
trading, play to earn games, amazing community, and much more…

Let’s Trade
